trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Burbank
There were no other sightings in Burbank on or around March 22nd 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI noticed a bright star near the moon. I first assimed it was Venus. Quickly I realized it was not, since it moved! It was very high,moving very fast, not blinking lights. It was not an airplane or helicopter. It looked like Venus, VERY bright white, star-like object.
